MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA10 postcode area of Windle affecting properties in Lynton Way, Calderhurst Drive and surrounding area . We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:58am. Our engineers are on site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.15pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.40pm on the 28th January 2021.
